content:
The following PR makes a bunch of files read-only in VScode.

chore: add setting to prevent accidental editing of dependencies #10320

As far as I can tell, this is a good default. But I'm happy to hear what others think.
Sometimes it's nice to toy around in such files to figure out what's going on, but if this is easy to override in such cases all for itm
Ok, I kicked it on the queue
